Items.Name: Ascendri bolts (e)
Items.Description: On hitting a target, you may gain a deathmark for 15 seconds. While marked you gain 1% extra adrenaline per hit on any target. The mark can be refreshed while active.

Items.Name: Ascension bolts
Items.Description: Very powerful bolts for use with the Ascension crossbow.

Items.Name: Bakriminel bolts
Items.Description: They have a mind of their own.

Items.Name: Barbed bolts
Items.Description: Great if you have a crossbow!

Items.Name: Blight bolts
Items.Description: Very powerful bolts infected with blight.

Items.Name: Broad-tipped bolts
Items.Description: For use against turoth and kurasks.

Items.Name: Bronze bolts
Items.Description: Bronze ammunition for crossbows. Used with the Ranged skill (1).

Items.Name: Diamond bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted diamond tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Armour Piercing - 5% chance to hit with 100% accuracy and deal up to 15% more damage.

Items.Name: Dragonstone bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted dragonstone tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Dragon's breath - 5% chance to hit your opponent a 2nd time for 25% of your current attack as dragonfire.

Items.Name: Emerald bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted emerald tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Magical Poison - 55% chance to poison your enemy for 4% of weapon damage.

Items.Name: Hydrix bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted hydrix tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Deathmark - 10% chance to instantly provide 10% adrenaline and an additional 1% adrenaline from basic abilities for 15 seconds.

Items.Name: Iron bolts
Items.Description: Iron ammunition for crossbows. Used with the Ranged skill (10).

Items.Name: Jade bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted jade tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Earth's Fury - 5% chance to stun opponent for 4.8 seconds. Only Binds in PvP.

Items.Name: Onyx bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted onyx tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Life leech - 10% chance to heal for up to 25% of damage potential (capping at 2.5k) and dealing 25% more damage.

Items.Name: Opal bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted opal tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Lucky Lightning - 5% chance to perform 10% more damage.

Items.Name: Pearl bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted pearl tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Sea Curse - 5% chance to perform 15% more damage to enemies weak to water and 15% less on enemies weak to fire. Turns off opponents run in PvP.

Items.Name: Red topaz bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted red topaz tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Down to Earth - 5% chance to reduce opponents magic level by 2 and damage by 1%. Caps at 10 levels and 5% damage.

Items.Name: Ruby bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted ruby tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Blood Forfeit - 5% chance to hit your opponent for 20% of their lifepoints and hit yourself for 10% of your lifepoints.

Items.Name: Sapphire bakriminel bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted sapphire tipped bakriminel bolts. Item bonus: Clear Mind - 5% chance to steal 5% of your maximum prayer points from your opponent.

Items.Name: Steel bolts
Items.Description: Steel ammunition for crossbows. Used with the Ranged skill (20).

Items.Name: Topaz bolts (e)
Items.Description: Enchanted red topaz-tipped steel crossbow bolts.
